verses.kjv: And there appeared a great wonder in heaven; a woman clothed with the sun, and the moon under her feet, and upon her head a crown of twelve stars:
verses.ct: Then an amazing sign appeared in heaven: a woman dressed in the sun, with the moon beneath her feet and a crown of 12 stars on her head.

verses.kjv: And she being with child cried, travailing in birth, and pained to be delivered.
verses.ct: She was pregnant and cried out in the agony of labor, in pain as she was about to give birth.

verses.kjv: And there appeared another wonder in heaven; and behold a great red dragon, having seven heads and ten horns, and seven crowns upon his heads.
verses.ct: Then another sign appeared in heaven: look — an enormous red dragon with 7 heads and 10 horns, wearing 7 crowns on its heads.

verses.kjv: And his tail drew the third part of the stars of heaven, and did cast them to the earth: and the dragon stood before the woman which was ready to be delivered, for to devour her child as soon as it was born.
verses.ct: Its tail swept a third of the stars out of heaven and hurled them down to the earth. The dragon positioned itself in front of the woman who was about to give birth, ready to devour her child the moment it arrived.

verses.kjv: And she brought forth a man child, who was to rule all nations with a rod of iron: and her child was caught up unto God, and to his throne.
verses.ct: She gave birth to a son, a male child who will rule all nations with an iron rod. But her child was snatched up to God and to his throne.

verses.kjv: And the woman fled into the wilderness, where she hath a place prepared of God, that they should feed her there a thousand two hundred and threescore days.
verses.ct: The woman escaped into the wilderness, to a place God had prepared for her, where she would be provided for during 1,260 days.

verses.kjv: And there was war in heaven: Michael and his angels fought against the dragon; and the dragon fought and his angels,
verses.ct: Then war broke out in heaven. Michael and his angels fought against the dragon, and the dragon and its angels fought back.

verses.kjv: And prevailed not; neither was their place found any more in heaven.
verses.ct: But the dragon was not strong enough, and they lost their place in heaven entirely.

verses.kjv: And the great dragon was cast out, that old serpent, called the Devil, and Satan, which deceiveth the whole world: he was cast out into the earth, and his angels were cast out with him.
verses.ct: The great dragon was thrown down — that ancient serpent known as the Devil and Satan, the one who deceives the entire world. He was thrown down to the earth, and his angels were thrown down with him.

verses.kjv: And I heard a loud voice saying in heaven, Now is come salvation, and strength, and the kingdom of our God, and the power of his Christ: for the accuser of our brethren is cast down, which accused them before our God day and night.
verses.ct: Then I heard a loud voice in heaven declaring, "Now salvation has arrived, along with power and the kingdom of our God and the authority of his Christ! The accuser of our brothers and sisters has been thrown down — the one who accused them in the presence of our God day and night."

verses.kjv: And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.
verses.ct: "They defeated him through the blood of the Lamb and through the word of their testimony, and they did not cling to their own lives even when facing death."

verses.kjv: Therefore rejoice, ye heavens, and ye that dwell in them. Woe to the inhabiters of the earth and of the sea! for the devil is come down unto you, having great wrath, because he knoweth that he hath but a short time.
verses.ct: "So celebrate, you heavens, and everyone who lives in them! But disaster is coming to those on the earth and the sea, because the devil has come down to you filled with fury, knowing his time is short."

verses.kjv: And when the dragon saw that he was cast unto the earth, he persecuted the woman which brought forth the man child.
verses.ct: When the dragon realized he had been thrown down to the earth, he pursued the woman who had given birth to the male child.

verses.kjv: And to the woman were given two wings of a great eagle, that she might fly into the wilderness, into her place, where she is nourished for a time, and times, and half a time, from the face of the serpent.
verses.ct: But the woman was given 2 wings of a great eagle so she could fly into the wilderness to the place prepared for her, where she would be sustained for a time, and times, and half a time, far from the serpent's reach.

verses.kjv: And the serpent cast out of his mouth water as a flood after the woman, that he might cause her to be carried away of the flood.
verses.ct: The serpent spewed water from its mouth like a river rushing after the woman, trying to sweep her away in the flood.

verses.kjv: And the earth helped the woman, and the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed up the flood which the dragon cast out of his mouth.
verses.ct: But the earth came to the woman's rescue — the ground opened up and swallowed the river that the dragon had poured from its mouth.

verses.kjv: And the dragon was wroth with the woman, and went to make war with the remnant of her seed, which keep the commandments of God, and have the testimony of Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: The dragon was furious with the woman and went off to wage war against the rest of her offspring — those who obey God's commandments and hold to the testimony of Jesus Christ.
